location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babbington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt at Bushire of 200 sabres intended for the use of His Highness Abbes Muza [Abbās Mīrzā], and notes that these have been stored in the factory pending further instructions from General John Malcolm or Sir Gore Ouseley.
